edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.utilities.flashcards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.utilities.flashcards.Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Deck
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Deck class for organizing FlashCards by subject with methods for shuffling, drawing, and putting back the cards.
    Version:
    CS56 W12
    Author:
    Chad Simmons, Shany Yeshanov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default constructor to make a deck with no name
      Deck(String name)
      Constructor to create a new empty deck with a given name.
